(A regular wizard of oz scenario cowardly lion included.) 

Phobia check long distance scanners to make sure that only 4 bots 
were in the area before lowering his shields and shutting down his 
guns. (The guns wouldn't do any good if you approached from the 
side.)"I have shown you a gesture of trust, now do the same for me. 
transform to bot mode (IF not already in bot mode) and lower your 
weapons to your sides. If you have optic blasters please approach 
with them off line." 

(I know I'm taking liberties here just prease bear with me.) The four 
Maximals lower thier weapons to thier side awaiting Phobias next move.

"I'm coming out, please try to reserve judgement until later, I am 
here to help.

The cargo plank lowers and a bright light is emmited from the inside 
of the craft. (I think the light thing is an unwritten rule of sci-fi-
it seems every ship does it.) As the plank touches the ground a lone 
figure steps into view, Predicon emblem shining almost tauntingly at 
the center of his chest. "I am Phobia, and you are?"

-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster grins, looking down at Hysteria. "We? We're going to meet a 
possible 
> ally."
> 
> Phobia's ship was visible in front of them. Kluster quickens his 
pace, 
> activating his comm-link.
> 
> "We're aproaching your ship," he says into it, "Me and two bots. 
Please do 
> not be allarmed."
